title: How to Make Yo Yo Biscuits

steps.headline: Cream the butter and sugar in a large bowl.
Add the other ingredients to the creamed mixture.
Roll out the dough.
steps.description: Cut into circular or oval shapes (these are the traditional shapes). Press down with a fork to leave fork ridges on the top of the biscuit.

steps.headline: Arrange on a baking tray covered with baking paper.
Place into a moderate oven and bake until golden brown.
Stick two cooked biscuits together using butter icing.
steps.description: Custard powder is often added to the butter icing mixture used for yo yo biscuits.

text: Cream the butter and sugar in a large bowl.  Add the other ingredients to the creamed mixture.  Mix well. Knead it a little. Roll out the dough. Cut into circular or oval shapes (these are the traditional shapes). Press down with a fork to leave fork ridges on the top of the biscuit. Arrange on a baking tray covered with baking paper.  Place into a moderate oven and bake until golden brown. This will be about 10-15 minutes. Stick two cooked biscuits together using butter icing. Custard powder is often added to the butter icing mixture used for yo yo biscuits. Serve the same day.
